DOC.brief_summary: Enzastaurin give daily patient non-small cell lung cancer fail least one prior therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Enzastaurin Second Third-Line Treatment Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer .
DOC.criteria: Must least 18 year old Must diagnose advanced metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer Must able visit doctor 's office every 28 day 6 month longer . Pregnant breastfeed woman Have significant medical problem determine physician Are unable swallow tablet Have history significant heart disease
